description: Wandering through the shop you see various weapons hanging both from
the walls and sitting upon display corners. The smell of melting metal
lingers in the air from the back where a large firepit heats the room.
A large table stands off in one corner and over the rows of weapons you
see the merchant working away on a shiny new sword.{x
39343.name: {wM{8eta{wl S{8ho{wp{x

description: Looking around the shop lovely displays of jewelry stand
throughout the room. The faint smell of coffee lingers in
the air from the cup one sees sitting on the counter. The
shopkeeper stands behind the counter looking carefully
at a lovely gem necklace.
39344.name: {GJ{gewelry {MS{mhop{x

description: {cLooking around the western wing one sees many things that show this
temple to be a place of worship.  Candles surround each chamber giving
off a enchanting glow.  In the centers of the chambers are benches for
the use of pray and worship.  Each chamber has its scents that invite
a worshipper, whether it be wax or wood or the faint intoxicating
smell of flowers.  This chamber seems to smell of the simple daily
scents of life food, hair, feet, body odor, and many other normal
smells.  So for those of middle class this would seem the best room
for worship, where one can be quite comfortable to pray in the silence
of this chamber.  {x
39279.name: {wW{Destern {wW{Ding{x

description: The tent is more strongly lit allowing for all to see the large
black-jack table featured in the center of the tent. To the east
is an opening to another tent. The faint smells of cigars and
beer linger in the air from the small bar standing in the corner
of the tent.{x
39275.name: A Gambling Tent

description: {cAs you enter the room, the eyes of several priests{x
{carmed with swords shift to watch your every move. At{x
{cfirst, you wonder why they pay so much attention to{x
{cyou in just this room, but then it becomes apparent{x
{cthat they stand guard for the forge that sits in the{x
{cback of the room.  The coals always tended and kept{x
{cburning red hot incase Gond ever blesses his priests{x
{cwith his presence and rewards their unwearying faith{x
{cwith one of his legendary pieces of metal work.{x
39281.name: {DA G{wuarded {DF{worge{x

description: The west central doesn't have much life to it, all around you see
the corpses of death trees. The faint smell of the ocean is the only
familiar and comforting thing about the roadway. And the occasional
small rodents that scapper past.{x
39324.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: The faint sounds of the city and the smell of the ocean make
your feet step a little faster. Hoping to get out of the heat
and hopefully into a cool building. But the dust of the road
still get to you as you push onward.{x
39296.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Moving along the main central you hear the loudest of the city and see
the people moving about their ways. All around buildings surround you
as you look toward the inner city. The shouts of the street merchants
echo in the air as you move onward.{x
39377.name: {CM{cain {CC{central{x

description: The large buildings of the surround you as you walk along midlane. Off
to the east is a new street called straight lane. Few travellers and
city people can be seen on the midlane as you wander along its shadowy
path and through the city.{x
39263.name: Midlane Street

description: Standing in the shadow of the enormous gatehouse, the sprawl of the
northern city is visible.  The sounds of a vibrant, thriving trade
city echo around you, along with the now familiar smell of the ocean
combined with soot and smoke.  A well packed dirt road runs east and
west, intersecting with the route south to the gatehouse.
39250.name: {YN{yorth {Dof the {YC{yentral {YG{yatehouse{x

description: All around people shout out their wares too any who
pass them by. The shops stand both to the north and
south. Buisness men nod at you as they pass and go
about their buisness. Wives drag along their children
as they go about their shopping for the day. Looking
around you see the true power of city life, and its
effect on people.{x
39335.name: The Wide

description: To the north leads the dusty and not too pleasant south central. And
to the south continues the some-what calm of the straight lane. Looking
around you notice that the buildings of the city can be seen in all
their glory now as you move further along.{x
39307.name: Straight Lane

description: {CE{cntering the shop you look at the artfully painting walls tha{Ct
{Cd{cisplay lovely rainbows. The different smells linger together i{Cn
{Ct{che room creating the illusion of magic. The happy pixie greet{Cs
{Cy{cou as you enter her shop. Allowing you to take a look at he{Cr
{Cw{cares and see the loveliness of the shop itself.{x
39385.name: {-R{-a{-i{-n{-b{-o{-w {CP{cotion {GS{ghop{x

description: Looking around the road side you can only see the sad display of tree
corpses. Making the journey an un-pleasant and depressing trip. With
a heavy heart your feet begin to drag as you wander along the west
central.{x
39365.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: Looking around the room you see all kinds of different items. Some so
unusual they seem almost to have appeared right out of the imagination.
A faint smell of body oder lingers in the air making the shop a bit
un-pleasant but still quite interesting. Along the walls paintings and
maps are displayed. On the corner you see different types of items such
as knifes, belt pouches and the like.{x
39347.name: Pawnshop

description: Looking around the cafe you see people from the city peacefully
enjoying their coffees or pastries. A group of business men sit off
in one corner all seeming to be talking at once, while one member of
the group takes notes. A Mother with two children stands in line
waiting for her turn to order. The smell of coffee and fresh flowers
lingers in the air, inviting a traveller to relax.{x
39349.name: Mocha Cafe

description: Travelling along the east central one feels a almost depression
at the very bleekness of the road. All around dirt and dust
control the air making you sneeze and wish for the road to
come to an end. The sun beats down on you makes the sweat
pour from your body. All around it looks as though the road
will never end.{x
39293.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Nothing grows along-side the roadway making the journey seem an
un-pleasant task. The dust just floats through the air making you
feel the urge to sneeze alot. And all around the corpses of trees
and animals ruin any pleasant thoughts.{x
39328.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: {cStepping through the large metal doors, you
find yourself in the inner sanctum of The High
House of Wonders where the loyal followers of
Gond do their private studying as well as keep
some of the closely guarded secrets handed down
to them by The Lord of Smiths.  The entire room
is illuminated by massive amounts of candles
hanging from the ceiling which provides ample
light to see the walls are totally covered with
books about metal work, engineering, and various
other crafts.{x
39387.name: {wI{Dnner {wS{Danctum {wo{Df {wt{Dhe {wT{Demple{x

description: The south seems to go on and on, but to the west you see a faint
twist in the road. Looking around you can see the beauty of the
small groves of trees which grow so lushiously along the road side.
Making the scenery more pleasant to travel upon.{x
39320.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Ahead to the north you see a large inn standing out against the rest
of the street. The loudest of the city seem now just a faint hum as
your ears get used to its lollaby. People wander by keeping their
eyes on their feet so as not to attract un-wanted attention upon
themselves.{x
39380.name: Sidelane Street

description: Wandering along the east central you wait impatiently for the
first view of the city, which can be heard so distant in the
winds. All around the dirt of the road twirts and dances in
the air. The sun's rays seem to push against your flesh making
the jounrey quite difficult.{x
39292.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: {DA statue of Gond stands here, carved entirely
out of white marble with rare cyan colored veins.
The statues itself depicts Gond The Wonderbringer,
Lord of All Smiths wearing the traditional heavy
leather vest of blacksmith with a hammer in one
hand and a set of tongs in the other.  Strapped
across his back is his legendary warhammer "Craftmaster".
On the statue itself, the priests of this temple
have created several armlets and other metallic
accents to show their faith and ask for the blessing
of their Lord.{x
{cAs soon as you enter the room, your eyes are drawn
to a rather massive statue situated in the center of
the room.  The statue depicts Gond in full blacksmith
garb with a massive warhammer strapped across his back.
The metal accents on the statue reflect the light of
the candles that surround the statue as well as a massive
stained glass window in the southern wall to illuminate
the entire room.{x
39278.name: {wW{Destern {wW{Ding{x

description: Off to the south is a new road though seeming to be the same as this
one, is called north central. The dust floats around in the air as
you move about your path. The faint smell of the ocean tickles your
nose as you move.{x
39361.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: Moving along the south central you notice that small groves of
trees grow along-side it. There faint pine smell lingering in the
dusty air. To the south is a new road though it seems to be the
same as this one. And to the east the south central continues.{x
39321.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: The dirt road seems endless as you move along it. The faint sounds
of the city and its people drift to your ear through the faint
gusts of warm air. And the smell of body odor lingers in the air
from other travellers you passed along the way.{x
39354.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Entering this shop one knows upon looking around it is a container
shop.  All along the walls they hang displayed to all who may wander
in.  Colors of the rainbow grace their material making them quite
noticable.  The shopkeeper stands among the containers studying their
material with a gleam of delight in his eye.  {x
39345.name: Peter's Shop of Travelling Containers

description: The faint sounds of the city only add to the beauty of the straight
lane. All around the people smile as they wander by, but you notice
as you get closer to the inner city the more people seem to shy away
from each other. With almost a sad heart you look at the lovely bushes
for the last time as they slowly die off to nothing.{x
39304.name: Straight Lane

description: Not much life can be seen along this bleak road, but the wary
traveller who merely continues along their way. The dirt seems
to alive with the heat of the road. All around the sun's rays
beat down on you, making sweat pour from your body.{x
39258.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Moving along the east central you notice that is does have some
twists and turns adding a little life to the dirt road. Though
nothing much of interest can be seen from the road, its the
distant and intriguing sounds of the city that drive you on.{x
39257.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Both to the east and west the sidelane street continues. Though to
what those paths may lead you can only see by taking them. The sounds
of the inner city seem almost vibrant now as you look around and see
the people of the city rushing along about their business.{x
39371.name: Sidelane Street

description: Continuing along the west central you see nothing of life along its
dusty path. All around corpses of dead trees and animals are
scattered along the road side. Making the air have an un-pleasant
and un-appealing smell to it. The bad smell forces you to move on
quickly.{x
39329.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: You around you and smile at the twists of the road, giving it
almost a livelier feel to it. The dust and dirt seem almost a
un-caring feature. And the sun seems to welcome you into its
very embrace.{x
39297.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Along the north central you see a large building falling apart
with age Its windows are cracked and now gusts of wind enter
its interior. Also you see the long seeming dirt road continues
to the east.{x
39252.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Just to the west you can see a large building standing out against
the emptiness of the road. The small grove of trees thins out to
nothing here, for the building seems to take up their space to grow.
With a quickened step you move through the dirt toward your sanctuary.{x
39316.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: The opens to the shops which stand to the east and north
of you stand open inviting all other come to the city to
take a peek inside. The smells of the city tickle your
senses as you move about the inner city. Looking around
you get a feel for the lives of the people who live each
day of their lives within the city.{x
39342.name: The Wide

description: Moving around the inner city you see shops all along
the heart of it. Their doors open inviting a vistor to
enter and see what wonders await. Flower sellers and
young news-paper boys shout out their wares to the people
who pass them by. As you move toward the city you been
to feel the liveliness of the city.{x
39339.name: The Wide

description: As you move along the south central the cool breeze that whistles
through the thin trees is a comfort. For all around things seem
to be dying off, execpt of this small grove of trees growing along
side the road.{x
39309.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Wandering along the sidelane street you hear the faint sounds of the
city and of laughter. People are just an occasional sight as you wander
along. Large building block the view of the sun, but allow for a nice
cool place to wander.{x
39374.name: Sidelane Street

description: The noise of the city is like a song for it surrounds your body and
seems to almost dance with your soul. The people of the city seem to
be almost intranced with it for they to dance with it as they move,
whether it be a spin to the right to avoid a person or a wave of the
hand as they continue along.{x
39381.name: Sidelane Street

description: Moving further along the sidelane you see the large buildings of the
city standing grand against the sunlight. People wander through the
streets going about their business at a more increased pace. The
smells of fresh food begin to drift through the air, making your
mouth water with desire.{x
39382.name: Sidelane Street

description: The north central corridor is a dense mix of hard packed sand and
rock.  Hundreds of years of footsteps have pressed the street into a
state as virtually as hard as steel.  The corridor has served the
residents of Baldur's Gate well over the years, linking the somewhat
isolated northern section of the city with the busier and more
populous southern sections.
39352.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Coming to an intersection you look around to see which direction you
wish to take. To the west midlane leads closer to the inner city and
both south and north continue along the straight lane leading you
along the outer parts of the city.{x
39262.name: Straight Lane

description: The tent is dark, lit with a few lanterns atop high poles.  The
tent is fairly small, with an opening to the east leading to another
tent, and an opening to the west leading back to the slot machines.
Many people gather around a central roulette table, desparate fro one
big win.
39274.name: A Gambling Tent

description: The sound of the city is quite loud and all around large buildings
surround you. People wander about their lives un-concerned with a
travel such as yourself. The smell of fresh food and flowers drifts
pleasantly over the air. Shops begin to appear just to the east. You
have now entered the inner city.{x
39370.name: Sidelane Street

description: Entering the inner city all around people hurry about
their everyday lives. The smells of the city tickle your
nose as you wonder the center of the city. All around
large builds stand blocks the sun, allowing only glimpses
of its bright beauty to peek through.{x
39331.name: The Wide

description: The street curves to the north here, and the sounds of the city
become almost a heart beat in your mind. People wander past some
actually smile at you and continue on their way. The smell of the
city lingers in the air making travel along the street quite
pleasant.{x
39270.name: Sidelane Street

description: The sounds of the city are very strong here for to the east is
an intersection which leads directly into the heart of the city
itself. Continuing along the south central you notice the beauty
of that small grove of trees growing along-side the road.{x
39315.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: A street to the east leads closer into the inner city and sidelane
continues to the north. The sounds of the city seem to be almost a
hum now as the intensity of life increases. All around large
buildings and trees block most of the sunlight making the city
almost in shadow.{x
39269.name: Sidelane Street

description: An intersection leads east toward the inner city and then the west
central continues to the north and south. The dust from the road
gathers around your body as you decide which direction to take. The
smell of the decaying trees and the ocean mingle together making an
overwhelming smell.{x
39363.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: {cEntering the temple one sees the wooden lining along
the walls allowing for those who enter to rest and pray.
Candles give of a pleasant glow as one looks around the
room. Displayed on the walls are wooden cases filled with
various swords and maces, showing all that Gond the god of
the temple, can create great beauty through his very hands.
Which makes the power of the temple even more empowering.{x
39277.name: {cT{8he {cH{8ig{wh {WH{wo{8us{ce {cof {cW{8o{wn{Wd{we{8r{cs{x

description: The dirt and dust from the road seem almost a mist, for in
every direction as the wind blows you can't see anything
but vague images and un-known shapes. Making travel along
the road seem endless and very un-pleasant.{x
39300.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Looking around the room you see the clerk standing just behind a large
desk. Off in the corner stands a large wall vault its silver polish
glistening from the sunlight. A large window stands open allowing the
cool breeze to enter the bank making it more comfortable.{x
39346.name: Baldur Bank

description: Looking around you begin to see lovely trees and bushes growing along
the roadside. The scent from the flowers drifts peacefully through the
air. All around the people seem happy and greet you as you wander past.
Wandering along you feel the pleasantness of the outer city.{x
39260.name: Straight Lane

description: You have entered the heart of this sanctum.  In
the middle of the room sits a large pool fed by
a natural healing spring.  Steam rises from the
water, slowly drifting upwards towards the high
stone ceiling.  Beyond the pool stands a priest
carrying an ancient tome healing weary and sick
travellers who have come to seek her assistance
in their journey.
39386.name: {CS{cpring {gof {GI{gnternal {GH{gealing{x

description: All around the smells and sounds of the city drift to your ears on the
pleasantly cool breeze. People wander past you going about their
business un-seeing of the travellers watching in their midst. The city
is embraced in a cool shadow for the tall buildings block most of the
sun, but allow just enough to make the city a desirable place to be.{x
39266.name: Midlane Street

description: Wandering along the sidelane street you notice that to the west a
outside street called west central begins.But also that sidelane
continues to the east. All around trees surround the street making
the sun seem a distant light.{x
39366.name: Sidelane Street

description: Travelling along the south central the only thing worthwhile
to look upon is the grove of trees growing along it. The sounds
of the city are at their strongest here, for to the west is an
intersection leading directly into the heart of the city.{x
39313.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Entering the shop you smell fresh bread and cookies so delicious it
makes your mouth water. Looking around you see that there is a display
corner showing different baked goods and drinks. The glass windows are
steamed from the large black ovens you see sitting in the back.{x
39348.name: The Bakery

description: People brush past you going on their daily buiness. Street
merchants stand in their assigned places, shouting out their
wares trying to interest those people who pass them by.
Homeless people wander around looking at those who pass them
by. Young students run home from school, only interested in
that evening meal.{x
39333.name: The Wide

description: The north central continues to the west and east. Making it seems
endless and quite boring to travel upon. But just to the east stands
a large building, looking to be a temple. Making the endless of the
road seem not quite so endless.{x
39353.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: The road seems endless and terribly lonely. The only one sees are
wary travellers that just quickly pass you by. The faint smell of
ocean now seems almost a curse, for no one along the dirt road
evens bothers to stop and breathe it in.{x
39356.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: The faint sounds of the city can be heard as you continue along
the road. All around dust and dirt fly in the air, never quite
seeming to stop. The smell of the ocean lingers in the air making
the journey a bit more pleasant.{x
39299.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Continuing along the south central the only thing pleasant about
the dirt road is the small groves of trees which grows along its
side. The faint smell of pine keeps a travellers' feet moving and
their heart lightens a little at the sight.{x
39319.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: A thin row of trees grow along the road giving a wary traveller
some shade in which to rest. Looking around the trees thin off
into nothing but dust. But the sounds of the city can be heard
over the wind.{x
39308.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Looking around as you travel along the midlane you see the beauty of
the city and of its people. All around they wander about yelling out
to each other in greeting and waving happily in goodbye. The strong
smell of roses seems to drift through the air making the city itself
seem intoxicating.{x
39268.name: Midlane Street

description: The noise of the city greets your every step making the urge to get
there all the more powerful. All around people wander along the roads
few smiling as they go about their business. The smells of the city
mixed with the faint scent of fresh bread tickle you down to your
toes.{x
39271.name: Sidelane Street

description: Entering the shop one sees the walls are lines with
displayn cases of weapons. All shining from the sunlight
streaming through the open window. The faint smell of
burning metal and body odor lingers in the room. The
shopkeeper stands in the back working tiredlessly on a
piece of metal, to become some powerful weapon used in
battle perhaps.{x
39350.name: {wA{8rmory{x

description: {cIn this room, the candles hang from the
ceiling in carefully crafted chandeliers in
order to free up as much wall space as possible
to display the fine works of art which Gond
himself has created inside this temple.  Each
piece has an engraved plaque below it telling
of the date at which he stepped from the ethereal
mist and blessed his loyal priests.  In the
center of the room sits an altar made of metal
for people to place offerings to their God.
39280.name: {wW{Destern {wW{Ding{x

description: Standing here you see an intersection: south leads closer to
the inner city, east and west lead you along the south central
road. A small cluster of trees that are growing along-side the
road draw your eye. They seem almost to be growing by magic,
since the heat is so overwhelming.{x
39311.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Moving through the twists in the road one sees only the death of
all that once lived. For the heat most of have killed all the plants.
Only occasionally do you see a small rodent wander past. The smell of
the ocean is a small comfort wandering along the dusty west central.{x
39323.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: Standing to the south is a large building with a sign indicating
that it is an inn. All around it the trees seem to have died off
for there is a gap behind the small groves of them. A faint smell
of fresh bread tickles your nose as you admire the beauty of the
building.{x
39317.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Moving along the nortal central seems its seemingly endlessness
continues both west and east. The faint scent of the ocean lingers
in the air, the only comfort on this dirt covered road.{x
39358.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Entering this chamber you see the beauty of the temple. All
around are gold candles lit in worship of the fair goddess
Tymora. Wooden benches are arranged artifully around the
chamber, allowing those who worship to kneel down and pray
to their goddess. All the chamber is centered around the
life-like statue of the fair lady herself.{x
39368.name: {WThe {YL{yady's {YH{yall{x

description: Moving along the straight lane you hear the loudest of the city and
feel a overwhelming urge to turn tail and run. For the thought of
leaving behind even the dusty roadway for the liveliness of the city
seems a sad thing. For no more peace will greet your step but the
loudest of the city and its people will replace those silent moments.{x
39306.name: Straight Lane

description: To the east you can hear the loud sounds of laughter and the occasional
sound of someone trying to sing. Also the smell of beer and body odor
drifts to your nose through the air. All around the people of the city
are smiling as they show amusement at the sounds of those merry people.{x
39373.name: Sidelane Street

description: Looking around the street you see that to the south is a glorious
temple. Made of white stone it shimmers in the sunlight, making the
temple seem a place of enhantment. The inviting smell of lilies drifts
pleasantly through the air. Continuing along the street you feel more
at home from the loveliness of that temple.{x
39367.name: Sidelane Street

description: Glancing around the street as you wander you notice the noise
of the city increases with each step you take forward. All around
people brush past going about their business. And the smells of
the city float to you over the gentle breeze, intoxicating as they
are.{x
39272.name: Sidelane Street

description: The east central seems almost an internity to walk. All around
you see nothing but distant hills and dirt. Few people are seem
along the road itself, showing that few people wish to travel
out in this intense heat.{x
39291.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: A workbench sits in the corner with a little gnome perched
up on a stool, carefully working on another work of art.
The smell of coffee is a bit stronger here as the gnome
seems to be just eating the beans straight up.
39388.name: {GJ{gewelry {MW{morkshop{x

description: Looking around now you find yourself standing in the
center of the inner city. Large buildings surround you
in every direction. A group of house-wives sit on the
benches surrounding the cool fountain. A young boy looks
up at you with his sad eyes, and as you watch his eyes
shift you whip around in time to scare the other youth
trying to steal your purse.{x
39332.name: The Wide

description: Wandering outside the temple you walk carefully through large pearl
gates and what lies behond those gates make you gasp with delight. All
around trees with blossoms grow their scent drifting in the air. Rose
bushes grow in every direction, along with lilies, daisies and almost
any flower you can name. The sound of rushing walk fills your ears and
as you look just behond the tree lies a large and breathtaking waterfall.
Its pure water racing along a stream within the garden. Sitting under a
large oak tree is a pearl bench allowing for those who worship to enjoy
nature at its most glorious.{x
39378.name: {GG{garden of {CG{clorious {MN{mature{x

description: A street leads off to the west here taking those who take it, closer
into the inner city. All around the people now seem almost shy of each
other as they wander by. No more happy smiles or enchanting smells can
be find here for the inner city and the life of it as destructed all
that was peaceful.{x
39305.name: Straight Lane

description: The long expanse of the northern corridor stretches out to the east
and west.  On either side of the corridor are long flat buildings.  In
between the occaisonal shop are various governmental and trade offices
serving the residents of Baldur's Gate.  Although this area is well
kept and tidy, it is obvious that conditions degrade as you move
towards the outskirts of the city.
39351.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Travelling slowly along the boring and dusty west central you see
only the occasional rodent, proving that there is still life. The
faint smell of pine lingers in the air from north up the road making
the journey less un-pleasant.{x
39325.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: Entering this part of the tent you see many slot machines
standing throughout the tent. Many wary travellers stand
before the machines hoping to win a little money to buy
a beer. The smells of body odor and cigars fills the air
of this tiny part of the tent. Listening to the machines
go, you feel an inner pull toward them to see what fortune
has for you.{x
39273.name: A Gambling Tent

description: Just to the west stands a large inn its cozy interior and the laughter
from its customers make you desire a cool drink and a rest. Though
painted a pale brown and not in the greatest condition it shows the
true peacefullness of the outer city and its people.{x
39301.name: Straight Lane

description: Like other roads that sound the outer city the east central
doesn't have much to it, just a general direction for which
travellers may use. Dirt and dust fly through the air and sun
seems to be shining its brightest making travel a little more
pleasant.{x
39295.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Travelling along the nortal central one fainty hears the sounds of
the city. The dirt from the road seems to stick to your feet as the
heat from the sun makes you sweat. The need for the cool air of the
city drive any and all travellers on along the dirt road.{x
39355.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Dust and decay surround the un-pleasant roadside. Making the journey
quite un-desirable. The faint smell of the ocean is the only comfort
to a wary traveller as the wander past this un-pleasant place.{x
39364.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: Wandering along the sidelane you can hear the faint sound so of
laughter drifting over the breeze. The buildings of the city are just
beginning to surround the street as you move along. To the west you see
the dusty road called west central. The faint smell of the ocean
drifts through the air as you move.{x
39375.name: Sidelane Street

description: Wandering along the east central you begin to see it isn't that
different from the other road you had just left behind. The dirt
and dust still lie everywhere and the bleekness of the road is
still there to haunt you.{x
39298.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Along the dirt road to the east lies an intersection leading
either to the north or continues east. Sounds of the city echo
through the air. Light winds reach up to grab upon clothing,
willing a traveller to go the way they direct.{x
39251.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: The smell of the trees blossoms and the loveliness of the scenery make
you feel truly enchanted with the outer city as you wander along
straight lane. All around the people smile and greet each other with
not a care in the world. And just seeing such peacefulness makes you
wish you had a part in it.{x
39302.name: Straight Lane

description: The sounds of the city seem to get louder with each
step. The city people are more alive and moving about
as you move further. To the west is a road which leads
out of the city. And the east road leads you into the
inner city. To the liveliness and noise of the city
itself.{x
39338.name: The Wide

description: The faint sounds of laughter drift to your ears as you notice that
to the east stands a large inn. With a quicken step you continue
along your path. The small grove of trees seems to have died off
before this point allowing room for the large building.{x
39318.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Travelling along the east central you feel as though it has
no ending. Every direction you look only the sight of dirt
and the length of the road greet your eye. Making the journey
almost depressing in its bleek lifelessness.{x
39259.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Entering the temple you see around you the beauty that is nature. From
the tree growing in through the open windows, to the rose bushes growing
softly along the window shill. The smell in the room is intoxicating
with prefection. A long pure white stone bench is displayed in the center
of the chamber. A large statue of the fair lady stands surrounded by
flowers just infront of the bench. Allowing those who worship to do so
in beauty.{x
39289.name: {YH{yol{Yy {GT{gempl{Ge{x

description: The very city seems to surround you as you look around.
Shops stand both north and south. People move about trying
not to look to closely at anyone. The sound of the city is
soo loud its like a hum. A road to the east seems to be
leading out of the city center.{x
39337.name: The Wide

description: Just to the north you can hear the sounds of the city for a
intersection leads you in closer to the inner city. The road seems
so dusty and lonely as you travel slowly along it. The faint smell
of the ocean the only true comfort throughout the journey.{x
39327.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: The buildings of the city surround you as you travel along the main
central. All around people go about their way un-caring of the wary
travellers who past them all dusty and tired. The rush of the city
seems to hum in the air making your body pump with energy.{x
39376.name: {CM{cain {CC{central{x

description: Now along the east central a road leading to the east of the
inner city. You see nothing of real interest around you. Only
the rare traveller can be seen walking along this dirty and
non-ending road.{x
39256.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: A breeze whips the dirt off the road, making it dance in the air
around you. And as it settles you notice the road has not changed
but seems even more endless.{x
39357.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Before you to the north stands a beautiful building. Its very walls
are scattered with enchanting roses, their vines twisting in a artiful
display of nature. The opens stand open allowing for those who pass
along to take a peek at the beauty of the building and what wonders
lie within.{x
39267.name: Midlane Street

description: Moving along the north central you see to the west a large
building that has long since begun to dissolve. To the east
you see that the north central continues and that a large
palace leads off from the weavy road.{x
39253.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: {cThe faint smell of candles lingers in the air. Off in
one corner of the room sits a table clustered with books.
Stepping back knowing that at any moment a priest will
wander in and find one peeking at things that are not
to be known. Along the walls are display cases of finely
crafted swords and maces.{x
39287.name: {wE{8astern {wW{8ing{x

description: {cEntering the room looking around one sees candles lighting
the room. Though played randomly to give off a good amount
of light. Their smell lingers in the air making the temple
seem to truely be a temple. Along the walls hang display
cases which hold large axes and swords. All finely crafted
by the god of the temple. His signature graces each piece
of work he does, and looking closer one can just see it
hidden mostly from sight.{x
39286.name: {wE{8astern {wW{8ing{x

description: {cCandles rest along the stone walls here to
{cCandles rest along the stone walls here to light
most of the chamber.  Between each pair of candles
is hung either elaborite tapestries showing The
Wonderbringer handing down some of his creations to
his loyal priests.  In a few rare instances, the item
shown in the tapestry is secured firmly to the wall
nearby as to not allow it to be taken.  From the south,
the faint glow of colored light can be seen.
39283.name: {wW{Destern {wW{Ding{x

description: The east central seems a road of death for all around nothing
grows, no life can be seen execpt those few indiviuals who
just continue on their way. The faint smell of the ocean and
the sounds of the city are the only things left driving you
onward.{x
39294.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: {cAll around the room large display cases show worshipers
the beauty that their god can create. Inside the cases
stand beautifully crafted swords and maces, their polish
gleaming in the candles light. Benches line the walls along
with candles allowing those who worship to do so at their
own comfort.{x
39285.name: {wE{8astern {wW{8ing{x

description: {cWandering through the temple one gets a feel for the god
that is Gond. For all throughout the rooms are beautiful
displays of his work. Candles glow alongside the benches
allowing for comfort in which to pray. Even along this
chamber walls are some well crafted swords which gleam
in the candle light. Giving the temple a more empowering
feeling, so the worshippers feel the aura of their god.{x
39284.name: {cT{Dhe {cH{Dig{wh {WH{wo{Dus{ce of W{Do{wn{Wd{we{Dr{cs{x

description: Travelling along the north central you notice that the road leads to
the north and a road called the west central, Or it continues to the
east. With a skip in your step you move forward toward your destination.{x
39360.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: The sounds of the city are stronger here, for to the west is
an intersection which leads closer into the inner city. A small
grove of trees grows along-side the road making the scenery more
cheerful to travel along.{x
39312.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: To the south the liveliness of the city can be heard.
The smell of the city comes alive within your nose as
you listen the loud hum of the city. Two shops stand
beside you to the west and east, their doors open to
the heat. To the north lies the outer road of the city.{x
39334.name: The Wide

description: The smells from the shops open doors tickle your nose
as you take a peek inside. The true life of the city
displays itself with the people who live there. The
street merchant try aimlessly to interest the people
who pass them silently by. The house-wives move along
with toddlers shopping for the evening meal. The noise
of the city becomes but a familiar hum in your ears as
you get used to its liveliness.{x
39341.name: The Wide

description: {cAs you continue to move west in the temple, the air seems to grow
increasingly warm, probably due to a well tended fire somewhere
further west.  The stones in the floor here are inlaid with intricate
metal designs which seem to be spelling out something in an unknown
language.  At the top of a spiral stair hangs a heavy steel door
leading to the priests inner sanctum.  {x
39282.name: {wW{Destern {wW{Ding{x

description: {cCandles surround the room allowing for those to worship
to do so in the beauty of candle glow. The priests of
Gond wander along the chambers helping those who ask. Along
the walls rest display cases filled with the swords and
axes of their god's creation. Giving the temple a more
empowering feeling.{x
39288.name: {wE{8astern {wW{8ing{x

description: Moving along the west central you see nothing special about it only
the sad corpses of trees and animals scattered along its side. Small
clouds of dust float through the dry air as you look around. The sun
beating down upon your back.{x
39362.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: Moving toward the inner city you see shops standing both
to the east and west of you. Street people stand shouting
out their wares to the lively people of the city. Travellers
push past each other hurrying about their business. More
shady characters peer at you through blood-shot eyes as
they move past you.{x
39330.name: The Wide

description: {CE{cntering the shop you see surrounding you walls of shimmerin{Cg
{Cw{cands. All formed out of love and devotion. Looking around yo{Cu
{Cs{cee the shopkeeper smiling pleasantly at you as you look aroun{Cd
{Ch{cis well designed shop. Paintings line the walls showing image{Cs
{Co{cf wizards in battle using beautifully crafted wands as they tak{Ce
{Cd{cown their enemy. Implying the true importance of a wand.{x
39384.name: {CZ{cappin{Cg {YW{yands{x

description: The peacefulness of the straight lane embraces you as you wander
along its path of nature. All around trees with fresh blossoms and
rose bushes line the streetway. Giving the air an enchanting aroma of
nature and life.{x
39303.name: Straight Lane

description: Looking around the sanctum you get a true feel for nature here. All
along the floor lushious grass grows and rose bushes line the walls
giving off their enchanting scent. A true feel of relaxation can be
found upon entering this place of healing.{x
39383.name: {GS{ganctum of {CH{cealing{x

description: The life of the inner city seems so vibrant, it also
physically pushes those who enter its heart. People
move around their lifes uncaring of the shady or just
wary people are them. The smell of odor lingers in the
air beside you as a shady looking man wonders pass.{x
39340.name: The Wide

description: Along the roadside grows beautiful roses bushes that give the road a
gentle and peaceful life. The people seem almost too happy as they
wander past and smile fainty at you as they go. The city can be seen
in the distant growing bigger with every step.{x
39261.name: Straight Lane

description: The loudest of the city throbs in your ears like a heart beat.
For there lies an intersection which can take you directly into
the heart of the city. Also the south central continues to the
west and east of this spot.{x
39314.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: Before you to the north stands a glory palace gateway. Now mingling
with the scents of the ocean are faint smells of fresh bread, leaking
from within the palace but way of open windows. You take note that
the north central continues to the east and west.{x
39254.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Standing against the sky to the west is a large inn, its doors slightly
open to allow a traveller to enter its warmth. People wander in and out
of the doors smiling and laughing as they pass. From within the faint
smells of ale and bread drift to your nose making the desire to enter
and rest overwhelming.{x
39379.name: Sidelane Street

description: The sounds of the inner city are louder here. For to the west
a intersection leads closer to the inner city itself. A small
sparrow flies past you and lands gently in one of the trees. The
faint sounds of its babies drift to your ears through the wind,
lighting a once heavy heart.{x
39310.name: {MS{mouth {MC{mentral{x

description: A large hall stands grandly to the north. Faint smells of lilies
and roses float softly in the breeze. The nortal central continues
to the west and east. Its dust surface seeming to go for miles on
end.{x
39359.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Wandering along the midlane all around people of the city and
travellers wander by. Looking around you take in the smells and sounds
of the city itself. All that is its life and feel the energy of its
heart. The large buildings of the city block your view of the sun but
in faint places you can still see that is truly shining.{x
39264.name: Midlane Street

description: Wondering along the north central you see that it continues to the
west, but also that the road east central begins to the north. Faint
sounds of the city drift to your ears yet looking around you can't
see the city in an which direction.{x
39255.name: {#N{3orth {#C{3entral {#C{3orridor{X

description: Arriving at an intersection you take a glance the street signs
indicating which direction goes where. To the north is main central
which will take you directly to the heart of the city. And both to
the west and east the midlane street continues.{x
39265.name: Midlane Street

description: Travelling along the west central you see that all around everything
seems to have died. For no living things grow along the road-side.
The dust and dirt seem to rule. To the north you see that a new road
begins with small groves of trees along its side, and to the west the
west central continues.{x
39322.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: The sounds of loud music and drunken laughter stream steady out of the
large gambling tents you see to the north. All around drunken women
and men laugh as they move past. The sounds of merriment seem to
lighten your heart and make you crave a good cool beer.{x
39372.name: Sidelane Street

description: Arriving at an intersection you take a look at the street signs,
to the east lies a roadway called sidelane street and the west
central continues to the north and south. A large rabbit runs past
you here along the pathway of dust.{x
39326.name: {RW{rest {RC{rentral{x

description: Only the occasional traveller can be seen along this lifeless
road. Though the faint smell of the ocean is a comfort, however
the need to have a rest weighs down upon you, as does the hot
sun. No trees surround the road making the heat from the sun
almost vicious in its intensity.{x
39290.name: {GE{gast {GC{gentral{x

description: Shops stand both to the north and south of you. Looking
around you see the city people moving about their daily
lives. And more shady characters eyeing you slyly as they
move past. A few homeless people move about trying to get
something to eat, looking at everyone with those large sad
eyes. Street merchants loud out their wares to all that
pass them by.{x
39336.name: The Wide

39312.room_name: A thrall is walking around, cleaning up.
39312.name: the thrall~

description:
This man wears a long white robe with the golden markings of
Tymora, Goddess of fortune, skill and adventurers.
39250.name: {Wa {YPr{yie{Yst{W of {YTy{ymo{Yra{x~
subroutines:
M speech 39253 tome of wisdom~
M grall 39254 100~

39251.room_name: A croupier stands ready to take the bets from punters.
39251.name: The Croupier~
subroutines:
M greet 39250 100~
M bribe 39251 10000~
M speech 39252 red~
M speech 39256 black~
M delay 39255 100~

39252.d_flags: D Oh,.. you got me,... I should have known!!!~
description:
{WT{wralina{8 stands here uddled intently over a black cauldron
creating various types of potions to be sold to her
customers.  While her body may look to be thin and wirey,
you can tell that it posses great power simply by how she
looks at you as you enter through the door.  On her left arm
are tattooed some words in a long forgotten language.{x
39252.room_name: {wA witch stands behind the counter, concocting brews to her patrons{x
39252.name: {WT{wralina{x~

39253.d_flags: D Ahh... you killed me!!! Ha!~
description:
{GB{gefore you stands a priestess, dressed in long flowing robe{Gs
{Gm{gade of fine silk.  Her hair has started to lose its color afte{Gr
{Gy{gears of practicing her healing magics here and throught th{Ge
{Gr{gealms before she came to rest here.  In her hand rests a tom{Ge
{Gf{gilled with the knowledge of the healing arts.{x
39253.room_name: {gA priestess stands in the rear of the room, reading from a tome.{x
39253.name: {GV{gic{cto{gri{Ga{x~

description:
{cLong ago, {YA{ymalic{c was merchant who travelled the realms
collecting all he could, but wands were his true passion.
He would go to the ends of the realms just for a chance to
obtain one not already in his collection.  However, as the
years past, his body became weaker and he was no longer able
to keep up his travels.  No longer able to pursue his passion,
he decided to set up this shop to provide some of his wares
to those who come to seek refuge in this sanctum.{x
39254.room_name: {yA elderly man stands behind the counter, selling his collection of wands{x
39254.name: {YA{ymalic{x~

description:
Standing behind the counter is a middle aged man wearing
a pair of thick cloth gloves as he removes a tray of hot
baked goods from the oven.  His glasses steam up from
the heat produced by his large oven before he remembers
to put them up ontop of his head.  Looking over, he sees
you and greets you with a quaint little smile while asking
if you'd like to sample any of his fine creations.
39255.room_name: {yA baker is here, tending to his fresh goods{x
39255.name: {GA{gl{ybe{gr{Gt{x~
subroutines:
F for A
F par B

description:
Ammalia is a young woman dressed in a nicely
pressed shirt and dress.  Her long brown hair
has been pulled up into pony tail behind her
head as so it wont get in her way.  Her eyes
seem to light up as she notices you and goes
to pick up a menu and lead you to a table.
39256.room_name: {xA young waitress picks up some menus as you walk in.
39256.name: {RA{rm{Ym{ya{Yl{ri{Ra{x~
subroutines:
F for AM
F par B

39257.d_flags: D Says 'My only regret, is that I didn't buy those plates with ducks on them.'~
39257.room_name: A wife is here, looking for goods to spruce up her house.
39257.name: A shopping wife~
39257.t_flags: T I wonder if I can find something for my house here~

39258.d_flags: D Shouts 'Oh great, looks like I'll definitally be late for that meeting'~
39258.room_name: A well dressed business man is here rushing around.
39258.name: A busy businessman~
39258.t_flags: T Please, dont get in my way, I'm in a hurry.~

39259.d_flags: D Shouts 'All I wanted was some fucking money or food you jack hole'~
39259.room_name: A homeless child wanders around here begging for change.
39259.name: A homeless child~

39260.d_flags: D Says 'Haha, the doctors were wrong, my liver didn't fail!'~
39260.room_name: A drunk stumbles down the road infront of you
39260.name: A local drunkard~

39261.room_name: (Invis) The dust blower swirls dust around people
39261.name: (Invis) The dust blower swirls dust around people~

description:
{cStanding tall as a brick house {GH{ce{Crm{ca{Gn{c wonders throughout his
pawnshop looking carefully at all his little trickets.  The smell of
german sausages seems to cling to the very hairs on his body.  With a
thick greasy bread he looks to be a man off the streets.  His thick
german accent makes it diffcult for his customers to understand him
and he is known for having a very short temper.  {x
39262.room_name: {cThe shopkeeper stands here looking a his treasures.{x
39262.name: {GH{ce{Crm{ca{Gn {cthe {CG{ge{Grm{ga{Cn{x~

description:
{YP{yete{Yr{y wanders aimlessly through his shop looking at the different
containers in his collection.  The smells of lunch linger in the air
from when {YP{yete{Yr{y had sat down to eat.  His blue eyes watch all those
who enter his shops, waiting for the chance to sell his goods.  {x
39263.name: {YP{yete{Yr{x~

description:
{8Standing at attention this priest knows his own strength.  With a
powerful battle arm he is ready for anything of those who might strike
against his god.  Though dressed in priest robes this man is truly a
warrior of his god.  This priest is quite important in his role to his
god for he stands guard over Gond's forge.  This forge is greatly
important in that Gond uses it for the purpose of creating his
weapons, and so this priest stands guard against those who dare try to
destroy that which is precise to his god.  {x
39264.room_name: {DA battle ready priest of Gond stands here, spear in hand{x
39264.name: {DA battle ready priest of Gond{x~
39264.keywords: fire guard house wonders battle priest~

description:
{MH{me has a slightly wild look to him, bags under his eyes an{Md{x
{Ma{m pair of thick goggles hiding his eyes.  His brown hair i{Ms{x
{Ms{mpiked in all directions, looking as though it has not bee{Mn{x
{Mc{mombed in weeks.  He wears baggy breeches and his tunic ha{Ms{x
{Mn{mo sleeves, revealing stick-thin arms that lead agile hand{Ms{x
{Mw{mith nimble fingers. The scent of coffee beans lingers ove{Mr{x
{Mh{mim.{x
39265.room_name: {mA frazzled-looking gnome sits here wearing a pair of goggles.{x
39265.name: {GI{gsaac{x~
subroutines:
M grall 39272 100~
M delay 39275 100~
M speech 39268 gem of power~
M give 39270 90~
M give 39269 12024~
M speech 39273 platinum boots~

description:
This young satyr seems lost and out of place.  Dirt and a thickly
matted coat suggest he lives on the streets of Baldur's Gate, with few
others here to call friends.  Bruises and scrapes suggests he has been
in many a fight, most likely due to the dislike many in these parts
have for his race.  Despite his ill fortunes, he has become a hardened
survivor of urban life, and it would be wise to keep one's distance
from this cunning boy.
39266.room_name: A {Ysatyr {yboy{x stands back amidst the shadows of buildings.
39266.name: a {Ysatyr {yboy{x~

description:
{wS{8tanding tall and bulky Vixen watches you as you glance cautiousl{wy
a{8round her weapon shop.  The smell of melted metal and sweat seem t{wo
s{8urround her making the need to turn away great.  Her black hair i{ws
p{8utted back and tied with a red ribbon her bulky arms flex with ever{wy
m{8ovement she makes and her standing so tall seems over frightnin{wg.  {x
39343.room_name: {8The bulky shopkeeper stands here wearing on a sword.{x
39343.name: {wV{8ixe{wn{x~
subroutines:
F for A
F par B

description:
{MH{mer hair streams gently behind her and she looks through he{Mr
g{mlasses at a piece of jewelry.  The faint smell of coffee linger{Ms
a{mround her for one can see she was clearly drinking some for the cu{Mp
h{mas lipstick stains along the rim.  Her clothes sit baggy on her bu{Mt
s{mhe seems uncaring of the image she protrays.  {x
39344.room_name: {mA shopkeeper stands here looking at gems.{x
39344.name: {GA{glisa{x~
subroutines:
F for V
F par D
M grall 39274 60~

description:
{cPale blue eyes and light blond hair are pulled back into a tight
bun to give a professional look.  A faint smell of lavendar lingers in
the air as she puts away a bottle of hand lotion.  Standing tall she
looks happily around her bank, at all the customer {x
39346.room_name: {cThe banker stands here awaiting your command.{x
39346.name: {CG{ce{Cn{ci{Ca{x~
subroutines:
F for A
F par B

description:
{8He looks at one with pale blue eyes that seem quite wise.  His long
black hair is tied back away from his face, allowing for the best
sight.  Large dark hands hard a large piece of metal gentle as a
child.  Overalls hang tightly off his bulky muscled shoulders.  {x
39350.room_name: {8The shopkeeper works in the back with a piece of metal.{x
39350.name: {8B{wrien{x~
subroutines:
F for A
M speech 39264 gem of power~
M speech 39265 special reason~
M speech 39267 pendant of power~
M bribe 39266 20000~
M speech 39273 platinum boots~

description:
He looks worn from his journeys, but alert nonetheless to any
danger that crosses his path.
39354.room_name: A wary looking traveller wanders here.{x
39354.name: wary traveller~
